
================
eos.setupAMBeq
================

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.eos.setupambeq

.. Don't include inherited members to keep the doc short
.. automodule:: nucleardatapy.eos.setup_am_Beq

Here are a set of figures which are produced with the Python sample: /nucleardatapy_sample/eos_setupAMBeq_plot.py

.. figure:: ../../../version-0.2/nucleardatapy_samples/figs/plot_eos_setupAMBeq_xe.png
	:width: 70%
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	This figure shows the electron fraction in asymmetric matter
	(AM) at beta-equilibrium with d=0.5. (left) Microscopic models and (right) phenomenological models available in the nucleardatapy toolkit.
